summary: A highly qualified and experienced legal and international trade professional, with extensive expertise in Government Affairs and Public Policy, Information and Communication Technology (ICT) laws, development, adoption and sustainability and in particular, areas relating to Digital Content, Cloud Computing, Privacy, Cybersecurity, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Financial Services Industry (FSI), Health, Standards, Corporate Compliance and the EU’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Also has a wide range of international experience in various international organizations, varying from the World Trade Organization (WTO), the International Standards Organization (ISO) to the United Nations agencies concerned with trade and development, intellectual property, the environment and e-commerce. Experiences also includes, foreign trade policy development and evaluation, IPRs, energy (general and alternative) the environment and sustainable development, in addition to contract administration, legal drafting of amendments to national laws in relation to the WTO. Finally, and as an overall rule, dedicated to maintaining the highest quality standards of practice

profile_positions.description:
•General advisor to the business leadership in Saudi Arabia Arabia and the Multi-Country Cluster (MCC) on government, industry and corporate affairs issues 
•Developing, orchestrating and implementing, in partnership with key stakeholder groups in the Company, strategic outreach strategies and campaigns to further enhance good policy on issues important to the ICT industry which include: cloud computing, standards, privacy, cybersecurity, AI, intellectual property rights protection, competition law, and trade and market access. 
•Supporting the Public Sector business through engagement with government departments, and development and implementation of strategies to support the revenue and growth objectives of this segment. 
•Externally representing the Company in national media and in small and large group settings to promote ICT best practices and develop a healthy ICT environment
•Advising the business leadership team on public policy issues, debates and trends and providing proactive advice on the impact and relevance of these issues to the Company’s businesses. 
•Directing the external engagement of the leadership team as it relates to outreach on public policy issues. 
•Building and strengthening the Company’s relationship with industry partners, trade alliances, advocacy organizations, multi-lateral organizations, and industry coalitions to more effectively shape and advance the industry’s position on important public policy issues. 
•Identifying new and emerging legal and regulatory issues that may affect the ICT sector in the region, thus analyzing and addressing such issues within the overall business strategy. 
Implementing effective measurements and analysis approaches for campaigns that will support prioritization of activities and investments
